content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-05-24 #25147 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.
Why did this not get the merge emoji?
Looks like the workflow which applies emojis only looks at master. I've opened #25187 to have it look at bump/* branches as well.
It's worked fine in this channel for months IIRC?
I take that back! We just get bors emojis!
I didn't even know that bors would merge into non-master branches

The bot used to do something, but it really was not meant to run on non-master branches. In fact, it decides whether a PR has been merged into master or closed and unmerged by inspecting the title of the PR and seeing if it begins with [Merged by bors].

We'll see how the change works!
Anyway, I think that it is good if it works, since I find it very convenient to have the emoji reactions for the "regular" PRs.
